channel.title: Whomever helps shall see a great reward!
channel.description:
[url=http://www.rs2leveling.com/xclient.rar]http://www.rs2leveling.com/xclient.rar[/url] (XeonScape Client)
I am trying to use that client a base to my server, but I think there is an anti leech of some sort because I cannot compile to change anything, and because the client won't work. Because once, I only changed the EUGI to my server IP and logged in fine, next I try to change the name of it to my server name, and it doesn't work. I reunrar everything, change only IP, and it works again.. Change ONE name to my server name, and doesn't.
Anyone who can solve this, can have the option to recieve $15.

item.title: Whomever helps shall see a great reward!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

how about use bluur’s client? its 10x better

Read full topic
item.source: Whomever helps shall see a great reward!

http://www.rs2leveling.com/xclient.rar (XeonScape Client)

Anyone who can solve this, can have the option to recieve $15.
